Now bound to your home, the ghost becomes your roommate, and it's up to you to find the missing pages of the book while navigating your unusual new life together.

name: Winning Post 10 2025
description: The "Winning Post" series, which celebrates its 30th anniversary in 2023, is an "authentic horse racing simulation game" in which players take on the role of an owner-breeder (horse owner and producer) and experience the drama of horses and people in the horse racing world.

name: Drakengard
description:
In the mobile version of the PS2 game Drakengard, you control prince Caim, along with the Red Dragon, in a struggle against the imperial forces. Each of the three locations consists of two sequences: side-scrolling fighting with Caim alone, followed by a flight sequence on the back of the dragon. On the ground, Caim's moves include sword combos with a finishing blow, blocking, jumping, a dash attack and a dragon attack. To launch a dragon attack, you have to fill your magic meter with finishing blows. Once complete, you can summon the Red Dragon to attack all enemies on the screen, except for the bosses. Each ground level is followed by a duel against a boss.

During the flight sequences, you control the dragon carrying Caim. You have to take out all incoming enemies and projectiles with fireballs and destructive spells or use the escape move for tricky situations. The game also incorporates some RPG elements: you gain experience by defeating enemies. These points can be used to level up, rendering attacks more powerful and expanding the maximum amount of health. Additional experience points are based on a time bonus and the stage score.

Although the story of the original game is only vaguely mentioned, all missions have an introduction explaining your mission and the setting. There is a high score list and you can upload your score to an online ranking board.

name: Beyond Citadel
description: Beyond Citadel is an anime style retro throwback shooter inspired by the classics of the 90's, with realistic gunplay mechanics, anime violence and fast paced combat. Fight your way through the heavily armed mechanical fortress and discover the secret that lies beneath.

name: UnBorn
description: You are trapped in a graveyard. Unlike the zombies that are out to eat your brains. You can't stay awake forever. Your gonna need to kill zombies for adrenaline. But zombies can't die. So your gonna need as much ammo and guns as you can find. Lucky for you the graveyard can supply you.

name: The Supernatural Power Troll
description:
The Supernatural Power Troll is a puzzle platformer in which you control a troll that can grant humans superpowers. By doing so, the troll overcomes obstacles and solves puzzles.
The game features diverse NPCs with AI generated dialogs, a level editor,

name: Call of Duty
description:
The mobile port of Call of duty plays as a top down shooter where you play as a crew of 3 units that you select, each with their own unique abilities, there are enemies to shoot, obstacles to destroy and pickups to help you along the way.

The goal of the game is to reach the end of each level with at least one of your 3 units still alive in each of the 9 levels.

name: Soap Bubble 2
description: Expanding the core concept of Soap Bubble 1, this game has the bubble struggling with wind tunnels, water hazards and a vast array of haywire machinery.

name: Zombie Fun Run
description: Join IRA, Crossing Guard Robot 2nd class, as he joins the Zombie Fun Run circuit and saves the day with the power of friendship and heavy artillery in this turn-based comedy RPG.

name: Ardente: La Grande Guerre
description:
In 1917, the war is violent on the Verdun front. But you are not one of those heroes who take up arms and kill enemies by the dozen. You are on the front to save the lives of wounded soldiers in the trenches. Fortunately, the invention of the “Little Curie”, a car created to transport radiology equipment on the battlefield, will help save lives where the wounded are dying.

You will drive and move from tent to tent to help doctors on site. But be careful, war is all around and the number of wounded is significant. Most will die, whether you like it or not.

Now the real question is : who are you going to save?

War isn't won with feelings and your choices will have consequences. Everything is going very fast and the slightest hesitation can be fatal for you and others.

You alone cannot change the course of war, but you can change the fate of many families.

name: Dungeon Crystal
description: Travel the seas, corrupted by evil crystals. Transform into different spirits and animals to solve puzzles. Find hidden treasures and become stronger to defeat the wild monsters. Save the islands by destroying the beautiful but destructive crystals. And take a break while catching some fish on your own sailing ship.

name: Davie's Quest and The Magic Dress
description: Sin descripción

name: 1x111
description: "1x111" (One times one-one-one) throws you into a thrilling 1-minute frenzy of 5 random 1-button minigames, selected from 111 unique challenges.

name: Ipseity: Arena
description: Ipseity: Arena is a modern-day take on classic fast paced multiplayer Arena Shooter genre in which players get to choose Ipseities, movement types such as bunny hopping, sliding, or walljumping that players can choose to play as before entering the fragging grounds!

name: Chalk River
description:
Chalk River is a dynamic Wild West-themed metaverse that blends immersive storytelling, intense PvP action, and player-driven exploration. Set in an expansive frontier, players can forge their legacy as outlaws, lawmen, or entrepreneurs.

Engage in high-stakes deathmatches, craft powerful NFTs, trade rare items, and complete story-rich missions to uncover the secrets of the rugged Chalk River Valley. With evolving gameplay fueled by blockchain technology, Chalk River offers a unique mix of adventure, strategy, and community-driven content. Saddle up and carve your path in this ever-expanding digital frontier!

name: Holy Valkyrie EXS-TiA: Concerto 1
description: In an ordinarily peaceful town plagued by disasters, the heroine Haruna becomes involved for reasons seemingly unknown. But in reality, she is a transforming messenger of justice on a mission to eliminate the root cause of the crisis.

name: Touhou Chaos of Black Loong
description:
Chaos of Black Loong is a Chinese Touhou Project fangame made by LonHong Team on the LuaSTG engine. It features recurring canon Touhou characters, 6 stages plus Extra and high quality voice acting.

Chaos of Black Loong reintroduces the partner mechanic. The game provides 4 playable teams with 2 characters each: Reimu Hakurei and Marisa Kirisame; Sakuya Izayoi and Hong Meiling; Koishi Komeiji and Satori Komeiji; Yukari Yakumo and Yuyuko Saigyouji

The player may freely switch between the two characters of the selected team by pressing C, along with their own shot type and Spell Card. By collecting items, grazing and defeating enemies, the Reward meter on the right side of the screen increases. Once it hits 1000, the player is awarded with a Life or a Spell piece. In addition, the game introduces a new type of item - Dragon spirits. Dragon spirits are a special item that disappear after a while onscreen. They increase the value of point items and lower the Point of Collection shown by the purple bar on the left side of the screen. The player can have at maximum 9 dragon spirits, and they can be released outside of a boss' Spell Card to cancel a radius of bullets around you. If you have at least 6, getting hit will consume 5 and give you an automatic deathbomb.

Additionally, the stage bosses in the game have secret Last Spells similar to Imperishable Night. When the halved sum of the current spells captured and dragon spirit count is higher or equal to the boss' total spell count, the boss' Last Spell will activate after the main battle.

name: Blightstone
description: Blightstone is a challenging, dark fantasy turn-based roguelike that brings unique twists to combat through freedom of character placement, interactive environments and hardcore resource management. Dying, learning, and meta-progression will be key in your mission to destroy the Blightstone itself

name: Stones of Flesh
description: Make your way through a land of unknown horrors, where the walls are made of flesh and seem to breathe as one. Defend yourself against the creatures with unique abilities in RPG combat.

name: Plain

Engage in solo play, challenge your friends and family, or work together to defend against the oncoming waves.

Pursued by relentless monsters and trapped in eerie, shifting environments, you’ll need courage and wit to survive. Can you uncover the secrets at the journey's end—or will the shadows claim you first?

name: Murder on the Nord Express
description:
It's a visual novel with elements of mystery and suspense, predominantly about the relationship between the Sheriff (Postman) and the Train Conductor (Gravekeeper).
It's heavily based on the detective novel that is considered to be the inspiration behind the story of the Essence and contains spoilers for the original work.
Additionally, the characters' backstories have been altered to better suit the story, and there are lots of headcanons and personal interpretations of these characters' original deductions.

You must check on the passengers, and noises from the plane, but do not leave the cockpit for too long. The Undead, Aliens, and different creatures have boarded the plane. They will try to grab, attack, and drag you to your death. Fly the plane, while fighting off these monsters to survive the flight.

At FiendFinder.com, we understand that conventional dating just doesn't cut it for everyone. That's why we've created a platform where the desperate and the damned can come together in unholy matrimony.

Whether you’re haunted by loneliness, thirsty for revenge, or yearn for forbidden knowledge, we’re here to match you with the perfect soulmate to fulfil your soul’s deepest desires – for a price.

name: Procedure
description:
A game made very quickly for Flatgame Annual 2016. I had surgery with a general anaesthetic for the first time in my life just before Christmas. This game is my response.

I tried to follow the rules for a flatgame as closely as possible – to make me work differently. The most striking thing for me is how directly personal it turned out. I had a vague idea of what the game might be about. The graphics were abstract scribbles done in half an hour. The game was put together in about three hours. I'm aware I haven't done anything interesting with space in the game but the focus was very much on the story.

Learn about star formation, planet characteristics, and Galaxy structures then dive into a Creative Build Challenge to create your own solar system

name: Powdergray
description:
Suffering from a severe heart condition, Satomi Kubodaira's life is prolonged
by a combination of medical progress and miracles...
But he receives the news that he will die by the age of 24.

He starts living with childhood friend Fumiyo Nukui to spend the days left to him...
But one day he becomes lost in an unfamiliar part of town.
In the midst of his helplessness, he witnesses a murder.

Cornered by the lust murderer Some Fujiwara,
Satomi is suddenly on the receiving end of a confession of love...

name: Detective: The Motel
description:
Detective: The Motel is an immersive deduction game that puts you in the shoes of a detective tasked with solving a mysterious crime in a rundown motel. Armed with only a pencil and paper, you’ll gather clues, interview secretive residents, and piece together hidden connections between suspects.

The challenge lies in the subtlety of the evidence—no one will help you, and the truth is hidden beneath layers of lies, secrets, and misdirection. Every room holds potential clues, and it’s up to you to connect the dots and answer the crucial questions that will crack the case wide open.

This game emphasizes realism in detective work, requiring you to thoroughly explore each room, analyze relationships between the motel’s guests, and decipher
their motivations. With puzzles woven into the investigation, you’ll need sharp observation skills and relentless determination to uncover the truth.
Can you solve the mystery before time runs out?

name: Spellwheel

In "Sunforge Solar Survival," you find yourself in a futuristic world of floating islands, harnessing the power of sunlight to thrive. You'll have the opportunity to build advanced structures, cultivate food, craft innovative gadgets, and embark on airship journeys to explore distant islands suspended in the sky.
Use renewable energy sources such as sunlight, wind, and water to power your creations and automate essential processes like resource gathering and irrigation.
"Sunforge Solar Survival" offers a unique blend of survival gameplay, technical innovation, and exploration, making every moment a quest for sustainable living in a beautiful and challenging environment.

Use your phone to scan, analyze, and solve puzzles in the warped world. Race against time to find your way home before the altered anomalies consume you.

Weak Water will steal dream storage tanks to restore self-awareness and earn rich rewards for a small number of people, but she will encounter various thrilling events.

name: The Betweenlands
description: Mori is stuck on the Core, miles below the beautiful Surface. She must use her trusty grappling hook to traverse the Betweenlands, clusters of floating islands hovering between the Core and the Surface. Explore and climb unique skyscapes to discover Mori's true desires in this precision platformer.

name: 1989 After the War
description: An atomic war has reduced the world to a heap of ruins. However, there are still those who refuse to give up and seek to bring justice even in this chaos. Use your blade, granades and shotgun to fight your way through this post-apocalyptic scrolling action-platformer in pure 80s arcade style.

name: Maestro's Cold War 2
description: Revive the Cold War in this simple yet effective strategy game, offering depth and great replayability.

name: Magical Massage
description: In a world where magic reigns, you're a rare mundane masseur, easing stressed magicians to prevent disaster. Flaming nostrils, flowers sprouting from backs, floods on the bed—nothing too fancy that you can't handle. However, if your skills fall short, these powerful, unclothed threats may kill you.

name: Compactory

name: Rusty Dudes

name: Japanese Salaryman

name: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time
description: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time is an RPG game which is based on the series "Twinsanity The Animated Series". Prepare to race against time with the evil mastermind Time Shadow. He trapped Twinsanity in another timeline and your job is to return him home. Are you ready to help him?

Fire Emblem: Path of a New World follows the tale of the Wayfarers, a group of elite soldiers sent to control a rebellion born of an aristocratic conspiracy, trying to subjugate Trames under the rule of it's sworn enemy, Algard, both countries of the continent of Gravia.

Their tale continues as they find much more than a war or a political crisis...

name: BakaSonic
description:
BakaSonic is a hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive by Bakayote. A demo of it was submitted for the 2014 Sonic Hacking Contest.

Started by Bakayote as practice for hacking, BakaSonic has been evolving since its creation, even being a prank at one point early in its development. This hack contains level art, object art, code and music modifications.

name: Post Apocalypse Courier Service
description: Can you build delivery vehicles to survive the post apocalypse? Go it alone or with up to 4 friends as you navigate treacherous environments, make deliveries, customise vehicles, scavenge for parts, and grow your delivery business!

name: Metroid RPG: Kilo Squadron​
description:
One of the Federation's finest teams, comprised of a group of...misfits, to put it somewhat bluntly.

This game is a spinoff akin to Shadow the Hedgehog and Luigi's Mansion, and Sonic Chronicles and Paper Mario, where the spotlight shifts to background characters, in this case a bunch of new ones, with a different RPG genre. Samus is almost nonexistent, instead the game focuses more on the biology, lore and backstory that enriches every Metroid game to date. It gives backstories and even a sense of family to once-faceless characters.

description: Reinterpreting the events in Metroid Prime's Sunchamber, Defend Your Flaahgra tells the tragic tale of a mutant flower's fight for survival in its own home. Using simple mouse controls, you must wield a diverse array of attacks and upgrades to resist the incoming legions of creatures and unleash the true power of the mighty Flaahgra!

name: Pokémon Emerald Legacy
description: Emerald Legacy is the finale of the three planned projects in the Legacy Trilogy. It is made using the Pokémon Emerald disassembly made by the Pret team. This game is focused on refining a game considered a classic while using 20+ years of hindsight to improve the experience. Emerald is a great game with a ton of flaws when you look at the game critically; poor Pokémon availability, odd team-building choices, a great story executed poorly, baffling rival decisions, and an Elite Four in dire need of improvement. Despite these flaws, Pokémon Emerald has maintained a positive reputation with memorable Pokédex additions, fantastic gym leader ace Pokémon, abilities, the Battle Frontier, and overall being a large step forward for the series. The Legacy Project aims to improve what makes this game great while improving its flaws.

name: Thundercade
description: The NES port of Thundercade. A nuclear powerplant has fallen into the hands of terrorists and you pilot a motorcyle equipped with machine guns that can be improved along the way. Make your way through difficult terrain and battle against loads of terrorists on foot, in cars, tanks and submarines who will try to stop you. Reach the plant and shoot all the terrorists to save the day.

”What are you listening to, Mikage?”
Spica is looking for something to listen to, and Mikage, the protagonist, goes on a journey in a mysterious world to search for songs that will please her friend.

What’s behind that last door? What is that heartbeat you can hear?

Using his newfound powers, he is able to kidnap Mario and Luigi just to make sure that nobody gets in his way. But he does not know that Princess Peach was brave enough to stop him. name: Gacha Resort
description:
Hit the Beach in Gacha Resort!

The ultimate summer beach vacation app! Collect over 140 different anime characters, each with their own unique swimsuit! Earn shells and gems and try your luck to gacha rare 6-Star units! Play a variety of beach mini games such as volleyball, surfing, melon smash, and more! Assemble a team of your favorite characters and battle enemies in adventure mode!

Dress up and customize your units with the hottest bikinis and swimsuits! Train your characters to increase their level, attack, and HP! Visit the resort for some one-on-one time with your characters to increase their affection level and make them stronger!

Ready to relax on the beach? Check out the shop and purchase new swimsuits, bikinis, weapons, surfboards, beach balls, tubes, decorations, and more! Every summer has a story, start yours now at Gacha Resort!

name: Spiral Clicker: Christmas Survivors
description:
Helen, your servant and partner-in-crime has a special surprise for you this Christmas; a trip to the North Pole realm where you can add Sandy to your harem. There is just one small problem; someone else already beat you to her!

With the North Pole swarming with mindless elves, imps, and succubi, the only chance you have of adding Sandy to your harem will be to survive their attempts to break your will and stop the source of Sandy's corruption... So you can corrupt her yourself.

6 characters from Spiral Clicker make an appearance in the game, and each specializes in one of the 6 spells in the game to change how that spell works for them.

Each character has a 5 part story line that plays out between stages, each concluding with a new full screen CG.

name: Nazareno Runner Semana Santa
description: Nazareno Runner it's a game based on the Spanish version of Easter week where you have to make your character run across the city in order to get in time to your brotherhood. Help citizens along the way, make them follow you, avoid pits in the road as well as angry by-passers and drones. Get coins to unlock extra characters, extras and blessings. This humoristic game aims to join people in these holidays with respect and without a religious bias. Get your toasts ready and make your character go as far as possible!

You can simply move the cars and trucks by sliding them. There are many game puzzles from very easy to extremely difficult.You will get gold, silver and bronze cups for each solved puzzle. When the situation gets critical, activate "ultra-sense", slow-down time and enhance your abilities. Embark on adventures through 48 levels, each offering unique challenges.

Encounter spirits rooted in Malaysian folklore, make critical choices to free trapped souls, and uncover the truth behind the eerie manifestations.

Coin Cascade is a crowd-play game designed around the classic 2p Machine and is a traditional arcade game, We have two looks to the game which allows users to change the machine to different views.

Twitch streamers share the gameplay with their followers, interacting through chat and video. This is a gaming collision of Arcade 2p Machines and social video streaming at its finest, with a growing collection of playable Machines.

Dino-Ducks Dash is a 2D Hi-Score Multiplayer Runner with PvP and Co-Op or you can even play it as a single player to beat the leaderboard.

It has a couch co-op mode and an online co-op mode, but you can also beat the stuffing out of the other cute Dino Ducks with a machete!

You take on the role of the sole survivor of a spacecraft crash, using a robot companion to gather parts for an SOS device while uncovering an eerie mystery that suggests they may not be alone.

As they navigate dark corridors, mannequins come to life, turning their escape into a fight for survival. Solve puzzles, uncover the mall's dark secrets, and evade relentless threats.

In Meow Meow Invasion, an action-roguelike survival game, parasitized pet cats evolve into powerful, intelligent creatures determined to conquer. Join in intense bullet hell combat mixed with strategic survival for a unique challenge in every play!

Your mission is to find the magic sarcophagus of the first vampire and use its power. Choose your clan and go to war for the underworld’s throne. Construct your secret city, research new skills and use them in battle. Experience the large singleplayer campaign with its numerous adventures and fight epic battles against vampires, werwolves and demon hunters.

Pass thrilling missions, fight your way from dungeon to dungeon and conquer castles and palaces. Find useful items and enchant them with powerful spells.
Expand your army by recruiting new heroes and train their skills to make them more invincible. Ally yourself with other players’ clans or challenge them in action packed multiplayer battles.

Pulling the monkey and making him fly is so much fun!

As a space survival simulation its inhabitants will find themselves awakened within a shattered region of space, warped by the presence of supermassive black holes gravitationally bound in a macabre dance. Rogue AI infests its depths; corrupting and consuming the remnants of what still stands.

And if you have time, attack and dethrone god. Ok? Don't worry about that portal. I'm sure it's nothing. Now be careful. Every choice matters.

The Hacker was known as the best of the best, delving into dark servers no one else could penetrate and returning with glittering data to sell on the black market.

Nobody knows why they quit. Some say their will was broken by the dark secrets at the heart of the Mainframe. Some say they simply retired to a penthouse suite in Low Earth Orbit.

But when you leave the world of high-stakes cybercrime, it's hard to stay gone. With a call from an old enemy in need of help..

868-HACK is 868-BACK.

Level up your character and upgrade your skills through quests or by defeating monsters ranging from the cute to the menacing using the wide variety of skills at your disposal. Test your might and compete with other players in the PvP arena. Group up with other players to finish quests, gain levels, defeat powerful bosses and complete difficult dungeons.

name: MXGP 24: The Official Game
description:
After a 3-year break, the official game of the MXGP is back. All the official bikes and 20 tracks of the 2024 calendar await to give you the full championship experience.

Play as your favourite riders, such as Jorge Prado, Jeffrey Herlings, Maxime Renaux and Andrea Adamo in the MXGP and MX2 categories. Over 50 riders are available, including those from official teams like Red Bull KTM, Red Bull GasGas, Monster Energy Yamaha, Honda HRC, Kawasaki, Nestaan Husqvarna, Monster Energy Triumph, Fantic and Beta MRT.

The extensive career mode offers full immersion in the championship. Manage the development of your team, schedule and rivalries. Start out as an amateur rider with the aim of being recruited by an MX2 team and, once in the MX2, achieve great results to be selected to join an MXGP team.

By free riding around the 4 km² (1.5 sq. mi.) training area, you can improve your technique and test your bike on six circuits and different terrain types.

MXGP is a realistic game that uses advanced physics to provide intense riding sensations, while offering user-friendly controls to help beginners quickly improve.
And for the more competitive players, the online multiplayer mode lets you compete against the best riders in the world.

description:
Draw, doodle, sketch and guess words with friends and make new friends. Speed Guess Something is a sequel toDraw Something, the most popular social drawing and guessing game, with many new fun features added.

While you can continue to draw and guess with friends and other players in a turn based game, we now introduce a brand new PvP challenge mode - ‘Speed Guess’. Play a real time PvP challenge with friends, to guess drawings and sketches correctly in the shortest time possible. Win a game and challenge other players to beat your best time. Challenge friends directly to a duel for the highest score in a guessing match.

name: Hunting Simulator 3
description: This open-world game lets you experience the thrill of the hunt, with your faithful dog or fellow hunters by your side! Choose your equipment from official brands, and explore the wilderness in search of your next game.

name: Deadcam
description: DEADCAM is a 80's and 90's inspired psychological survival horror game based around found footage presented as "recordings". These recordings serve as a collection of short, self-contained experiences, each set in their own location featuring unique entities, monsters and creatures.

name: Steel Commanders
description:
The World Invasion has begun! Play now to join the resistance!

The Ultimate Sci-Fi Trading Card Battler!

name: Passant: A Chess Roguelike
description: Passant is a chess roguelike. Gather powerful pieces, items to win unwinnable games and badges which can provide power-ups and change how the game is played.

name: Stick Fight: Shadow Warrior
description:
Do you like fighter games? Do you enjoy stickman games? Are you ready for the stick fight extreme Stick Fight duel??
The hero of the casual stickman Stick Fight games is returning. The fight game with endless waves of ninja enemies hordes will test your brawl and survival skills. Become the ultimate stickman warrior boss in this free funny and hypercasual battle royale game.

name: Throne of Valoria
description: An epic 2.5D RPG adventure with metroidvania elements and unique artstyle. A compelling story with challenging bosses and fluid combat, all in an immersive environment

name: U.A.S
description: A psychedelic first person shooter heavily inspired by Cruelty Squad, made as a submission to LSDJam 2023 and serves as a spiritual sequel to Portland: 2024.

name: Stickman Legends
description: Stickman Legends is an offline free-to-play shadow fighting stickman game, which is a great combination of action game, role-playing game (RPG), and player versus player (PvP). Dive into the epic shadow battle and enjoy the dark fantasy of war as you have to fight against cruel enemies, evil monsters and mighty bosses.

name: WhereTaken
description: Place a pin on the map to guess where in the world a photo was taken. Players have 5 rounds of distinct locations, earning up to 200 points per round depending on how close their guess is to the photo depicted.

name: Nekron: 24
description: A fast paced FPS Roguelike where you, a rogue AI created by the last Supercomputerist, are tasked with forging connections between programs. On your mission you will also destroy unthinking machine men and rescue relics of humanity.

name: Super Mario War: Stomp Arena
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Revenge: Demon Slayer
description: Epic Stickman Revenge is a mix of Roguelike and classical RPG. This game lets you join in the Shadow ninja world with beautiful graphic epic adventure action. Unlock power by map, collect the best equipment and fight against with strongest shadow monster.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Aurelia
description: Sin descripción

name: Stickman Warriors
description:
This fighting game will give you a chance to become one of super heroes to fight with enemies and protect everybody on earth. Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. If you love playing games then this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

With addictive gameplay fighters, your enemies will upgrade their power and you have to fight for survival. To fight against the most Boss likes Ninja Black, Big Thunder lizards..., the shadow stick fighter may need to upgrade your power to the highest level. We bet you will enjoy the abundant upgrades for and all your stickman heroes in the best action RPG fighting game.

name: This War of Mine: Forget Celebrations
description:
This is a charity initiative. All proceeds go to our partners: War Child, Amnesty International, Liberty Ukraine, and Indie Games Poland Foundation.

10 years have passed since the release of This War of Mine and the game’s message still remains poignant. In October 2024, the game was awarded a Special Recognition Award by Amnesty International. Sadly, the same award shows that the world hasn’t become a more peaceful place since the game launched in 2014. So instead of a big celebration, we’ve decided to dedicate this anniversary to doing the right thing. This War of Mine: Forget Celebrations is a DLC with a new story, special items, and, most importantly, a chance to support people in need.

name: Mind Benderz X
description: A short, psychedelic first person shooter.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Secrets
description: Sin descripción

name: Black & White Creatures
description: Sin descripción

name: Flesh Prison
description: Flesh prison. Who is trapped? You? Or your mech. Blast your foes with immense firepower. Rocket launchers, machine guns, and your trusty massive flesh saw. Turn off your lights, close the door, turn up the volume and rip the knob off. Blow them to pieces as this is what you are now, you are no different than the beasts you massacre. Is this earth? Or is this hell?

name: Dust and Echoes
description:
Dust and Echoes is a semi-open world fps that takes place in Oregon after doomsday. The game has 3 missions that can be completed in any order. After completing all 3, a new location will open on the map for the ending.

You can engage with NPCS and merchants to buy better gear and replenish health and ammo. Killing raiders will also allow you to sell their fingers for currency. "Dire coin" is the crypto currency of this world.

Underneath lies a story about accepting your face and learning to deal with the issues that surround you. Your life is what you make of it.

name: The Dreamer
description: The Dreamer is a top down shooter where you, the player, engage in a psychedelic dream version of New York City. This game is short and contains two separate endings. See if you can complete them both. NPCs can help you with hints to that days quest. Created by Hunter Brown and Josie Coulter.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Shattered Dimensions
description: Sin descripción

name: What is this Thing?
description: What is this Thing? is a highly unconventional, episodic platform game made by DJ Yoshiman.

name: Portland 2024
description: FPS inspired by LSD Dream Simulator and Cruelty Squad. Fight your way through each level and explore till you find doorways with moving smiley faces.

name: What is this Thing?: Episode 1
description: Sin descripción

name: What is this Thing?: Episode 2
description: Sin descripción

name: A Woman for All Seasons
description: Sin descripción

name: What is this Thing?: Episode 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Ant: Protect The Queen
description: Face endless hordes of fierce and powerful invaders. Fight, gain experience, evolve and become stronger to protect the queen.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Secrets
description: Sin descripción

name: Nether Dungeons
description: Nether Dungeons is an action-packed dungeon crawler. Battle through procedurally generated dungeons, face relentless enemies, and defeat epic bosses. Customize your hero, wield diverse weapons, and survive intense challenges as you descend into ever-changing, dangerous depths.

name: La Cita de Mookie
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Energy: Blow the monster!
description: Release chi-bullets of various elements and blast away the enemies!

name: La Leyenda de la Biblioteca
description: Sin descripción

name: Polarity Warthog
description: A sci-fi noir themed horizontal shooter. Somewhere deep in space, battle the dark energy alien forces, while collecting light energy to level up your weapons.

name: Vartra Abyss
description: Vartra Abyss is an isometric ARPG that has the player exploring a dystopian underground cavern in search of their lost friend. You must learn to fight using your new abilities that you will attain by slaying enemies. Play your way and mix up your abilities to suit your playstyle.

name: La Llave y Fabián Shones
description: Sin descripción

name: PockeDate!
description: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Una Aventura de Cine - Edición Original
description: Sin descripción

name: Memoralysis: The Scorched Home
description:
An unusual case calls for an unusual detective.

MEMORALYSIS is a murder mystery visual novel with point and click elements that follows the psychic detective Philon Delancy to a strange seaside town to solve the murder of one of its most notable public figures. What starts as a routine house call quickly reveals a tangle of messy relationships, local superstitions, and past unsolved mysteries— and at the center of it all is the victim’s enigmatic niece, Celosia James.

He’s not one to balk at whisperings of the occult. How could he, when the greatest tool at his disposal is the ability to catch glimpses of his suspects’ memories? But surely the rumors about the young heiress have been greatly exaggerated. After all, everyone knows demonic possession isn’t real.

name: Angel Legion: Future Dream - Green
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Phiba
description: 2D Pixel art shooter game. This game is still in development and the details are not yet final.

name: Nephilim Resurrection
description: Embark on a furious journey, protecting precious cargo in a perilous world. Boomer shooter mechanics blend with puzzles and strategic encounters. Engage in PvE action, solve puzzles, and battle foes to a heavy metal soundtrack, immersing you in the adrenaline-fueled atmosphere.

name: Modyssey
description: Step into a cosmic cycle - between past, present and future. Modyssey is a journey through a geometric world, a dialog with an unknown counterpart via the universal language of dance, sound and music.

name: Desperate 1: After Sunset
description: The first work of the "Desperate" series - After Sunset, it’s a horizontal 2D action game with hand-painted, and using a new keyboard operation, you can feel a more intuitive combat experience in this game. Fight for the thing you loved in your life in every street you pass by！

name: Hexceed: Viridis Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Viridis Puzzle your way through 120 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Glass Heart: Retold
description: A modern romance otome/visual novel filled with drama, angst, adventure and, most of all, love. With a twenty percent chance to survive, you decide to experience living outside of a hospital for the first time. Can your heart handle the love that you find along the way?

name: G.E.A.R.
description: A first person game with 2D, realistically simulated, physics-based puzzles.

name: Sweet Cards
description: Sweet Cards - is a card-matching game. Players can choose one of three decks of cards to match. Each deck of cards has a different style. As long as the player successfully matches all the cards, he can enjoy the beautiful girl's beauty in the viewing mode at any time. Tutu.

name: Terres: Supporter Pack
description: Purchasing this cosmetic supporter pack unlocks the player colour customization and supports the Terres development process.

name: My Caligula
description: My Caligula follows the Roman Emperor Caligula and his sisters as they navigate college life in the modern day. In this visual novel your choices will determine if you live or die as well as your love interest.

name: Battlerace Support Package
description: Your purchase of the package is crucial for our operations, enabling the development of more innovative games. With your help, we can continue working on creating satisfying productions that will deliver unique experiences to our players. Thank you for your support!

name: Quest Girl
description: 《Quest Girl》is a cute and relaxing mini-game that takes place in a miniature fairy tale world. Players can explore the world, collect stars, and use them to heal small animals. Please enjoy this beautiful little landscape.

name: Blood Within: Star's Shadow Armor
description: Unlocks the cosmetic content for Captain Thorne.

name: Okthryssia and Saturnia's Bureaucratic Adventures
description: Help Okthryssia and Saturnia navigate the tormented ways of bureaucracy and claim their inheritance.

name: Blood Within: Thunderstorm Armor
description: Unlocks the cosmetic content for Valu'ur.

name: Glitch Hero
description: A fatal error has trapped Ada’s father inside Codeland! As young Ada, wield the (virtually) mighty hammer.exe and debug the corrupted virtual world while learning basic coding concepts in an irreverent, fun and thrilling action puzzle adventure.

name: Tower Defence Engineer
description: A meat pigeon tower defense game. Pick your players, collect treasures, and break through the enemy's heavy barriers. Each expedition brings a new experience. Tired of playing? You can also participate in the design of game levels as a game development engineer to give yourself a boost of intensity!

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Hope of the Alliance: Special HQ Statue
description: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Special HQ Statue - (Nowa Haniwa) Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: Chernobylite: Black Smoke Pack
description: Transform your hideaway into a coal-powered command centre.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Pioneer Pack
description: Add-on for Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes, containing 1x Headquarters Custom Object (Honorable Flag) and 1x Early Bird Pack (1x Enhancement Rune & 1x Enhancement Accessory). Please double-check all descriptions before purchasing.

name: Hell Let Loose: Airborne M1942 Reinforced
description: Drop into the thick of the action with our latest Free DLC. This uniform showcases the historical changes the US Airborne had to make to their uniform due to the material lacking strength in key areas such as the elbows and knees.

name: Angel Legion: Shadow Woven - Blue
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: RealRTCW: Agency Weapon Pack
description: Equip yourself with the "Agency Weapon Pack", bringing three new weapons to your arsenal - silent De Lisle Carbine, precise M1941 Rifle and unstoppable Auto-5 Shotgun.

name: Molo's Revenge
description: Molo's Revenge is the incremental journey of a mole dragon to avenge his village by doing the thing he does best: Digging.

name: R-Space
description: R-Space is a fast-paced first-person shooting game that supports up to 4 people online. Players need to survive round after round of trials, continuously strengthen their abilities, and challenge higher rounds.

name: Mercenaries of War
description: Welcome to Mercenaries of War, an online hardcore PvP survival game with permanent death.Keep yourself protected by buying weapons and stocking up on bullets. If you die, your character is permanently dead and you will have to start over fresh.

name: Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade: Nekozeno Shin - Collaboration Commemorative Residentization DLC
description: A collaboration DLC project between "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" and Vtuber "Nekozeno Shin"! The phantom thief "Nekozeno Shin" appears in the world of "Rota's Nautical Chronicles of Trade" transformed into a pixelated character!?

name: Embershade
description: A psychedelic roguelike where you sell pieces of your soul to gain power against surreal, impressionistic monsters.

name: Pickup 'N' Packup!
description: Pickup 'N' Packup! is a virtual reality puzzle game about putting objects around your house in their proper places. You don't have all day to clean up the place, so do your best to form the most efficient and quickest way to pick up everything and pack it up!

name: Gates of Despair
description: Gates of Despair is a captivating single-player survival horror game with multiple chapters. Experience randomized gameplay, creepy jumpscares and terrifying enemies. Uncover the captivating story through cutscenes and master a variety of challenges. Are you brave enough?

name: Melly the Naughty Dog
description: Melly the Naughty Dog is a short, funny point-and-click puzzle game with hand-drawn and digital art. Play as Melly, navigating his dream world, solving puzzles, and meeting characters like the fairy dog and the knight to reclaim his jug and return home.

name: Floor X
description: Floor X is an anomaly hunting game. You need to escape from a surreal office where the space is constantly changing. Take pictures of anomalies, try to survive and reach floor 0.

name: Warno: Reinforcement Pack #1
description: Expand WARNO's battlefields for free with the Reinforcement Pack #1, bringing a massive brand-new built-up battlefield, Urban Frontlines. Inspired by the “railway” city of Lehrte in West Germany, the large-scale built-up map is one of the biggest WARNO has seen.

name: Alaskan Road Truckers: Truck Skin Pack
description: Drive with style! The collection of 10 skins is inspired by the geometric style of real life paint jobs of American big rigs, with an addition of a new beautiful hand-made painting presenting the colder side of Alaska.

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Robots by datGestruepp
description: Get 20 beautifull traditionally hand drawn Robot paintings from datGestruepp to puzzle.

name: Silent Breach
description: A short cosmic horror game where you remotely operate a land rover through an unknown planet labeled the silent zone.

name: Telomeria
description: A short, horror themed point-and-click adventure set in an empty, dreamlike pre-rendered world.

name: Holi-Zone 97
description: Holi-Zone 97 has been saved from digital obscurity and its restored servers now live in the public domain. Check out the most popular holiday-themed MMO of 1997. 64kb internet connection recommended.

name: The Legend of Peach: Insert Random Title There
description: Sin descripción

name: P.O.S.S.U.M.
description: Explore the city rooftops and a haunted hotel lobby to find artifacts from the past. Made for the Haunted PS1 2021 Madvent calendar.

name: Please Don't Feed the Creatures of the Deep
description: Use your trusty potato gun to feed the local wildlife. Horror-themed low-poly shooter set by the sea.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Chiming Bells
description: Join Link and Chia in their adventure to stop Rodrick in the only steam punk inspired Zelda fangame created!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Threads of Despair
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon: Berserk
description:
The Awakening Phenomenon is a phenomenon we have recently discovered by using the power of the Berserk Gene found from different types of species of Pokémon.

It temporarily increases your stats in battle, although the phenomenon still has a couple of quirks so you may not want to use it all the time, or else your Pokémon may have some... Unfortunate side-effects.

name: Zueirama 2077
description: Zueirama 2077 is an update to the game Zueirama, the humor game based in brazilian games now with an futuristic aesthetic.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Time Walker
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords Online
description: Sin descripción

name: No Stars No Problem
description: Awaken from your dream and explore the liminal remains of a dead universe. Explore an open city scape with all sort of platforming mechanics. Run across billboards, double jump between platforms, and leap from wall to wall. Talk to a wide variety of NPCs and delve into deeper and deeper states of unreality.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Mask of the Gods
description: Sin descripción

name: The Adventures of Zomboy
description: A bite sized post apocalyptic point and click adventure game, where you play as a passive zombie.

name: EarthBound 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Metroid Defense
description: Metroid Defense is a metroid themed 'Maul' Tower Defense Game. Like other tower defense games, the player builds towers to fight off hordes of enemies, but unlike most, the path is not defined - the player makes their own maze out of the towers.

name: ShockWave
description: ShockWave is a strategy video game released for the Amiga in 1990 by Digital Magic Software.

name: Lights Out Luigi
description: The objective is to shine your flashlight on the boos by moving the mouse up and down and then click them with the left mouse button to make them disappear.

name: The Lost City
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Mario
description:
This game is a mix between Paper Mario and other traditional platformers. The player moves around in the same way he does in the original Paper Mario, while fighting enemies in a platformer-like style.

There is a point-based rank system in the game. Each time you defeat an enemy, you earn points. Every time you earn a certain number of points, you level up and earn more health. This gives you a reason to want to stop each and every goomba!

name: Close Encounters
description: Deflect one or more balls to targets for collection. Each planet presents a challenging array of targets that must be collected to the waiting UFO above.

name: King Solomon's Mines
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Paper Bowser World
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas Station Weed Simulator 2024
description: An immersive, analog-style simulator wherein the player explores a gas station, tries different varieties of cannabis, and interacts with the environment.

name: SHPDMBGWL4 Sunshine
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Metroid World
description:
Control Samus Aran (Metroid) and fight against familiar enemies that appears from both video games.

You are able to jump and shoot, and even do it in slow motion. In order to shoot however you must be in the orange power suit. If your suit is blue, you will not be able to shoot. Avoid touching any enemy or you will die instantly.

name: Hypnorynth
description: You are pursued by a malevolent entity. You must enter the maze, meet its strange inhabitants, uncover its secrets and reach its center if you hope to make it out alive. Will you escape the Hypnorynth?

name: Rendezvous Delano
description: Rendezvous Delano is a SHMUP-style game for the Nintendo DS with several Metroid elements, including specific enemies, weapons, upgrades as well as the ability to explore various alternate routes through each of the several revisitable areas.

name: Somnicoda
description:
Somnicoda features an assortment of dreams for your perusal, from idyllic forest pathways to brooding cityscapes. Be wary however as these dreams may twist into nightmares...

Through the somnia you will come across keys and equipment to help you progress through the dreamscape and piece by piece bring an end to the turmoil within.

name: 'Rift' Electric
description: 'RIFT' Electric is a first person puzzle game where you take a questionable job listing and must enter strange homes to turn off all the lights. Using a lens that reveals hidden objects and electrical connections, you must figure how the rooms are wired to escape safely.

name: Drive On Lucy
description: A simple atmospheric walking (driving) simulator, done in 7 days for LSDJAM 2023. WASD to move, SHIFT to speed up, and that's about it. Go link up some beacons along an abandoned road. Get those asbestos-filtered cigs.

name: Mercurial Dreams
description: In 'Mercurial Dreams,' you're a cat plush toy whose mind mysteriously entwines with that of your young owner, a kid, shielding him from bad dreams. The game is set in 'Mercurial Village', a weird place with a river made of mercury and strange buildings. Your job is to keep the kid safe from scary dreams by playing mini-games and completing tasks inside strange buildings. 'Mercurial Dreams' is all about adventure, mystery, and being a hero in a dream world.

name: Emre and Jevon's Tale of Knowledge, Emulating a Dream Where You Gain Wisdom and Knowledge and Probably Meet Hermes
description: This is the game we made for the LSD game jam in two weeks even though we had way more time. Its father is the sun and its mother the moon. And it was borne from the earth where it ascends to the heaven and becomes ruler over that which is above and that which is below.

name: Cannoneer
description: Cannoneer is a 2-dimensional, top down shooter game. You bomb planes to earn treasure and get new high scores. You can use that treasure to purchase skins and use those in game. The main gimmick of your cannon is that you only have one bomb. Every time the bomb leaves the screen you get it back. The cannon is stationary, but you can rotate in place at a set speed. The game mechanics include 30-second waves of planes that change direction and location every wave, speed increases per each wave, an explosive grenade that spawns after you shoot 15 times, and intense situations coupled with high-speed gameplay. You can track your best scores with the scores tab in the menu, and compete with your friends to get the best score. Good luck!

name: GirlDivers
description:
Join the GIRLDIVERS, humanity's last line of offense against an overwhelming alien menace.

Command sexy girl soldiers in a rich campaign full of randomly generated challenges, unforgiving enemies, sci-fi gadgets, and heavy firepower. Engaging in lewd punishments and rewards along the way.

name: Crowd Run
description: Stop the hordes of enemies and defend your castle!

name: Apex Drift Tokyo Streets
description: Sin descripción

name: Internet Cafe Manager 2025
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval Match Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Hop Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Carderia
description:
Rebuild and defend the fallen medieval town of Carderia where all is represented through cards. Stack your cards together and end your turn, to create buildings, mine ore, grow food and more!

But be careful to not run out of food throughout the nasty cold winters, live, survive and you may prosper during the verdant summers. Carderia is full of predictable and unpredictable events alike that spices up the gameplay in every run.

name: 1-Button platformer
description:
Space is the only button you need

There are 3 levels

If you cannot beat the levels holding shift in the level, select and dragging the red bar off of the levels will unlock them

(you might have to click on the game at the start)

name: Odd Remedy
description: Escape the open-world island infested with monster spiders while on duty as a prisoner with your friends. Loot the city, destroy the caves, take some selfies on the way out in your car before you set sail.

name: Sword Play! Ninja Slice Runner
description:
Sharpen your blade, sword master! Dive into the world of action games where every slice is a masterpiece of power and precision. Sword Play is not just a game; it’s a duel of fate and glory set against a backdrop of breathtaking landscapes and mysterious enemies.

Welcome to Sword Play! - a marriage of cutting games and action games, a universe where each slash is a testament to the skills of the kunai master. With no need for internet, relish in the challenges of games with no wifi and embark on an epic ninja journey that knows no bounds!

Dash through numerous challenging levels, a perfect mix of slicing games and fighting games, where every enemy defeated is another step closer to becoming the ultimate slice master. With no wifi games feature, the adventure never stops; it only becomes more intense.

Feel the thrill of the sword fight, where ninja slice maneuvers and swift katana strikes rule the battlefield. Face hordes of assassins, ragdoll ninja warriors, and master the arts of ninja game strategies amidst the heat of the battle.

name: Titan Empires
description:
Lead your army to greatness in Titan Empires, the next evolution in strategy gaming! With faster-paced combat and clever tactics, train and equip your powerful Titans to unleash a flurry of skills in battle.

Join an Empire of players, get help fortifying your city, and use your Titans to defend friends from would-be raiders.

name: The Gate
description: The Gate uniquely combines Real Time Strategy (RTS) and Card Collecting Game (CCG) mechanics. Battles are rendered in hand animated 3D while collectable cards are presented as beautifully illustrated artistic masterpieces. Solo battles provide a chance to strengthen your army, while Raids, Arena Battles, and World Bosses get your friends in on fight.

name: The Spearman
description:
The spear is a throwing, piercing or piercing-chopping polearm weapon.
With the help of a spear, a warrior will be able to effectively counter a lot of enemies.
Control the Stickman to throw spears at other stickmans. You will be confronted by many enemies: archers, javelin throwers, armored swordsmen and even magicians.

Simply drag and drop your finger for targeting and throwing.
The power of throwing a spear is always the same, so you only need to aim and specify the direction of the throw.
Enemies die from one hit of a spear in the head and body or from two hits of the spear in the legs.

In the game there is a store with helmets, several defensive skills and an apple for healing.

name: Ultimate Combat Fighting
description: Prepare yourself for the Ultimate Combat Fighting challenge! Fight your way to become a black belt martial arts master! Learn all the moves and beat your opponents in this intensive action fighting game. Whether your style is karate, kungfu, tae kwon do, or boxing, just swipe your moves and start throwing some kicks and punches! Learn the moves to master the art of free fighting in this ultimate challenge.

name: Uncanny Cat Golf
description: Uncanny Cat Golf is, at its core, a simple golf game; using your mouse, you hit the CANNY CAT and you try to get it to the goal in as few hits as possible. Look out for the UNCANNY CATS, however - they will constantly pursuit and will not stop until they catch you!

name: Funko Fusion: Trap Jaw
description: Blunder your way through Funko Fusion with Masters of the Universe’ very own metal munching moron Trap Jaw, who is now a playable character!

name: Funko Fusion: Invincible Pack
description:
Expand the Invincible universe in Funko Fusion with the Invincible Pack. This pack includes:
Atom Eve - Playable character
Atom Eve - Alternate Eve Outfit
Rex Splode - Playable character
Invincible - Blue Suit Outfit
Omni-Man - Viltrumite Skin

name: Injustice 2: Black Lightning
description: Special skin that turns Raiden into Black Lightning – includes new appearance, moves, and dialogue.

name: Volleyball Champions 3D
description: Realistic Physics combined with intuitive controls and beautiful graphics make this the best Volleyball game on mobile. Swipe your finger to send the ball flying in the direction you want, it is easy to learn and fun to master.

name: War Lords
description:
War Lords is a strategy MMO (Massively Multiplayer) game that requires players to build and upgrade their kingdoms as fast and efficiently as possible. Get ready to face invaders from all across the land and engage in epic battles for imperial supremacy. It’s time to claim your rightful place as ruler of the War Lords and build your Empire!

Make use of the card system to build an even greater army! Each card represents an officer or general who can lead your soldiers. Cards are classified by rank: S is the highest, followed by ranks A, B, C and D. The higher the rank, the stronger your troops! Take a chance and buy random cards from the store, search for cards in the Recruitment Center, or combine existing cards to get new ones. You can even trade with other players! Choose from famous generals such as Guan Yu, Liu Bei, Cao Wei, Zhuge Liang and Sima Zhao and many more!

name: War of Nations
description:
Become the strongest Commander and a fearless leader by building a military empire and conquering your enemies. Forge an alliance between empires so you can take over the world. Command YOUR powerful army into battle and march into enemy territory with force and power in this PvP strategic game!

Get ready to report to alliance base, explore new locations, construct new buildings, and collect the latest supplies in your march to victory. Defeat your enemies in epic single-player campaigns and recruit new commanders, and war experts to seize the day!

name: Westbound: Perils Ranch
description: Explore the lush woods and western mud bay in this Cowboys ranch town. Challenge yourself and build your own Cowboys township, city or village by clearing out a blissful obstacles and debris. Venture into this western island and create your own vivid bay. Have fun in this western farm simulation game.

name: Word Search: Classic Game
description: This Word Search game has more than 22000 puzzles distributed in 37 languages, 3 sizes and 3 difficulties!

name: Wordly
description: Spell the longest words possible, claim your opponent's tiles, and dominate the board in this exciting letter landgrab game. You can play against friends and family everywhere, on both smartphone and tablet, and challenge historical and literary greats -- such as Shakespeare, Cleopatra, and Count Dracula -- in "Play the Greats" mode, Wordly's awesome single-player experience.

name: La Mansion Hoover
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man CD: Rock Version
description: A homebrew port of the NES version of Mega Man/Rockman to the PC-Engine CD, with CD quality music.

name: La Odisea del Fracaso
description: Sin descripción

name: Vesuvius
description: Vesuvius is a single MBF21-compatible map created in commemoration of @AD_79's birthday, based heavily upon the work they did in 2015's "Violence". Many resources from that project have been lifted wholesale, or slightly tweaked for taste. Included is a new palette by Fuzzball, music by Jimmy and AD_79, and a surprise new enemy. A sprawling reactor base featuring over 1200 monsters, all in tightly-wound and highly-calibrated setpiece encounters, along with some nasty incidental traps along the way.

name: Kidname: Iceboy
description: KIDNAME: ICEBOY is a fan-made prequel to the legendary Sierra On-Line title CODENAME: ICEMAN. The prequel follows patriotic child JW as he embarks on the adventure of his young lifetime--a trip to the US Navy's new Submarine Camp program!

name: Ember Storia
description: Ember Storia is a strategic RPG by Square Enix with the character design by Yūsuke Kozaki (Fire Emblem Awakening, Fire Emblem If). The game will be out on PC and Mobile on 27/11/2024 in Japan.

name: Merge Together
description: Merge Together is a relaxing two-player puzzle game where strategic thinking, harmony, and teamwork are key. Players aim to combine sweet fruits, level by level, to achieve larger fruits and ultimately reach the final goal: the watermelon.

name: I Am a Worm
description: Oh, to be a worm, in a dream, trying to find an exit to get out. After all, can you imagine not having the arms for forks or spoons?! A short, worm-themed platformer.

name: Dreamspace
description: Dreamspace is an atmospheric game about dreams. Explore surreal locations and meet different NPCs. The game contains 17 unique dreams and takes about 30 minutes to complete. The game was made for LSDJam 2023 in 3 months.

name: I Can't Trust My Eyes
description: I Can't Trust My Eyes is a short horror game about mental aberrations. Faces of other people started to distort after the accident - terrifying, isn't it? The game takes about 5-10 minutes to complete. Made for Acerola Jam 0 in 2 weeks.

name: Weird Pizza Dreams
description: What happens when you eat some weird pizza before going to bed? You have WEIRD PIZZA DREAMS! It's short and maybe not too difficult but I hope you have fun playing it. This was made for LSDJam 2023.

name: Unwilting
description: Explore the unwilting gardens in this relaxing first person gardening adventure game!

name: Sycamore
description: Sycamore is my submission for LSDJAM 2023, made in 5 days. It's a short top-down game with a surreal look. The goal is to find items hidden in the worlds you reach. The game is focused on exploration, so you'll have to interact with the level to find. There's a planets order, so keep this in mind. The game has two states: When you're in the planets and when you're in the spaceship. The spaceship controls quick, while the cowboy controls at a slower pace.

name: Milon's Secret Hell
description: Join Milon as he dies and goes to Hell! Pure arcade fun, meet four cruel gods, and discover five secret rooms. A fanmade sequel to Milon's Secret Castle.

name: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition - Chronicles: Battle for Greece
description: Chronicles features Age of Empires II gameplay set in antiquity. In Battle for Greece, the first chapter of this multi-part saga, fight with three new ancient civilizations and experience a grand narrative campaign, from the Ionian Revolt to the Peloponnesian War.

name: Final Fantasy Essence
description: Sin descripción

name: Yoshi's Dreamer
description: Sin descripción

name: Plumber Waluigi
description: A story-based puzzle / adventure game, starring Waluigi and his apprentice, Percy Piranha.

name: Super Mario Bros.: The Cookie of Destiny
description: Sin descripción

name: The Twisted Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: La Odisea del Fracaso II
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario: The Stellar Star Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Nacho Trave vs. Joako Tronico
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Rinseout
description: Use stealth and other ninja skills to rescue the princess.

name: Tamayoshi +Vance
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Doopliss World
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bratarsi
description: Super Mario Bratarsi is Jaklub's Super Mario fangame, which joins gameplay of Super Mario 2, 3 and World and mix it with various Super Mario elements.

name: Nexus: FPV Drone Shooter
description: Nexus is a high-speed FPV roguelike shooter where you pilot combat drones through intense aerial missions. Master fluid flight mechanics while blasting through procedural missions. Customise your build, upgrade your base, and push deeper into enemy territory with each run.

name: Paper Mario: Time Strewn Star
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Shadowgazer
description:
Close your eyes and step into a shadowy other Hyrule, a dream-like realm blighted by the Maren - ancient evil spirits that cause nightmares. Conquer your darkest fears and rid the kingdom of its bad dreams to unravel the mystery of the Maren's curse.

The Legend of Zelda: The Shadowgazer is a fan game being developed in Game Maker by King Mob, and features:

Two parallel versions of the game world: the everyday waking world, and its nightmarish counterpart, unseen by all except those trained to use the Shadowgazer - a magical totem that protects the bearer from the nightmare realm's maddening effects;

A rotating three-day schedule, governed by the comings and goings of the ships in the port town of Hyrule. Record valuable information regarding the nightmares of the passengers and crew in your Cabin Boy's Handbook.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Specter's Oculus
description: Sin descripción

name: Davy's Dreams of Chasing Things
description: Created for LSDJAM 2020. "Davy's Dreams of Chasing Things" is a game poem about anxiety dreams.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Hall of the Dead
description: Sin descripción

name: Bonnie Blob in Shapeville
description: Welcome to Shapeville, a colorful world filled with friendly shapes and endless fun! Meet Bonnie Blob, a bubbly little hero with a curious mind and a heart full of adventure. Explore the whimsical corners of Shapeville, where every click brings something delightful to life.

name: Volvy’s Adventure DX
description: Sin descripción

name: Dfiance
description: A multiplayer collectible card game set in a unique fantasy world where warring factions fight in a competition for resources on the battlefield.

name: Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain
description: This is an emulation of the classic PS2 action-adventure title, Blood Omen 2: Legacy of Kain. Chronologically, this takes place in an alternate timeline, between the events of Blood Omen and Soul Reaver, and lets players experience Kain's epic adventure on PS4 and PS5 for the first time.

name: Rugby Leage Live 2: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Rugby Leage Live 2 is a rugby simulation game in which players compete against real-world teams in realistic matches. It features a number of different game modes, including a career mode, custom matches and online games. There is also a Fanhub program in which a user can create and edit teams, players and competitions.
The Game of the Year Edition includes 2013 Roster and Kits available via DLC code.

name: Enemy Front: Limited Edition
description: Enemy Front is a first-person shooter in which players assume the role of an American journalist as he battles Nazis during World War II. The limited edition includes collectible protective case, a standalone mission Raid on St. Nazaire, the game's soundtrack, and extra weapons including the M1 Garand and Webley Pistol.

name: Car Guy Soundboard
description: Car Guy meets his new friend Blobinko and the two get into a debate. Car Guy is a short animation I released on April 6, 2022. Year later on November 27, 2024, I woke up with a vivid dream of me creating a Car Guy soundboard. I saw this as a vision and took it upon myself to make my dream into a reality.

name: Gothwane Towers
description: Welcome to Gothwane Towers, where murder is imminent! Carefully observe the occupants of the house. You may be called upon to identify a suspect. Gothwane Towers was created in December 2020 for the concurrent 7DFPS and PROCJAM game jams. It is a spiritual successor to Where's Tango? and a loving homage to the works of Edward Gorey and Agatha Christie.

name: Li'l Taffer
description: A procedurally generated stealth adventure! Developed in slightly more than 7 days for the 2022 7dfps and PROCJAM game jams.

name: Stickman Party
description:
Stickman Party is a unique arcade game created so that you can have fun in the company of friends, as well as Stickmen!

Here is a whole collection of addictive and very exciting games for every day, play wherever and whenever. Compete with your friends or family in more than 30 different types of competitive games, this arcade will allow you to play immediately 1 2 3 and four players on one device. Fight on powerful tanks in hot dueling, play soccer in team battles 2 on 2 or 1 on 1, take part in crazy car races and fight in an open area in a battle where the strongest wins!

name: Injustice 2: Gods Shader Pack
description: The Gods Shader Pack grants access to recolor the entire equipped set of gear for multiple characters.

name: Injustice 2: Demons Shader Pack
description: The Demons Shader Pack grants access to recolor the entire equipped set of gear for multiple characters.

name: Injustice 2: Power Girl
description: Special skin that turns Supergirl into Power Girl - includes new appearance, moves, and dialogue.

name: Injustice 2: Reverse Flash
description: Special skin that turns The Flash into Reverse Flash - includes new appearance, moves, and dialogue.

name: Injustice 2: John Stewart
description: Special skin that turns Hal Jordan Green Lantern into John Stewart Green Lantern - includes new appearance, moves, and dialogue.

name: Schloss der Wölfe
description: Schloss der Wölfe ("Castle of the Wolves") is a minimalist World War II first-person shooter with a classic horror twist.

name: Urban Dreambog
description: A short (~15 minute) walking sim in a dream like urban environment.

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations: Sonic Jam Skin
description: Sin descripción

name: Funko Fusion: Team Fortress 2 Pack
description:
Meet the Team Fortress 2 Pack!

Packing more punch than the sandvich, this FREE all-action add on is kind of a big deal! Relive some of your favourite Team Fortress 2 moments in Funko Fusion with these characters:

- The Scout
- The Heavy
- The Engineer
- The Medic

name: Funko Fusion: The Walking Dead Pack
description:
Survive the apocalypse with The Walking Dead Pack.

Contains:
- Rick Grimes playable character
- Rick Grimes "Leader" variant outfit
- Michonne playable character
- Michonne "Traveler" variant outfit.

name: The Man Outside
description: A short, gameboy-like game based on one of the developer's dreams.

name: Funko Fusion: Sun Wukong
description: Unleash heavenly wrath as the unstoppable Monkey King, a legendary figure of unmatched will and determination. Where there is true will, there is always a way.

name: Funko Fusion: Back to the Future Outfits Pack
description:
Great Scott!
You won’t need roads where we’re going with Back to the Future’s beloved Marty and Doc! This DLC includes:
Marty McFly 1955 Outfit
Marty McFly 2015 Outfit
Doc Brown 1985 Outfit
Doc Brown 2015 Outfit

name: Funko Fusion: Bob Ross Pack
description:
Bring the joy of painting to Funko Fusion with the iconic artist and pop culture icon Bob Ross!

The Bob Ross Pack introduces everyone’s favourite artist to Funko Fusion and contains:
- Bob Ross as a playable in-game character.
- An alternate Bob Ross variant.

name: Undertide
description: You arrive by boat at a blinking tower, a body washes up in town. Talk to townsfolk and explore in this dreamlike mystery.
